goal.name: gp_score
goal.title: GP - Does not affect Robot Game Score

restriction.message: Container Must be No Longer Touching East Deck to Score Completely East of Deck
Food Package must be released from own helicopter
Color match containers inconsistent with number of circles with complete containers
Number of containers completely in circles inconsistent with circles with complete containers
Must have 1 circle when some containers completely in

subjectiveCategory.name: core_values
subjectiveCategory.title: Core Values
subjectiveCategory.scoreSheetInstructions: The Core Values should be the lens through which you watch the team's presentations. All team members should demonstrate the Core Values in everything they do. This rubric should be used to record the Core Values observed throughout the judging session. Core Values will also be evaluated at each Robot Game with Gracious Professionalism scores, which will feed into a team's overall Core Values rank.

goalGroup.title: Discovery
goalGroup.description: - Team explored new skills and ideas.

goal.name: discovery
goal.title: Discovery
goal.description: Team explored new skills and ideas.

goalGroup.title: Innovation
goalGroup.description: - Team used creativity and persistence to solve problems.

goal.name: innovation
goal.title: Innovation
goal.description: Team used creativity and persistence to solve problems

goalGroup.title: Impact
goalGroup.description: - Team applied what they learned to improve their world.

goal.name: inclusion
goal.title: Impact
goal.description: Team applied what they learned to improve their world.

goalGroup.title: Inclusion
goalGroup.description: - Team demonstrated respect and embraced their differences.

goal.name: inclusion1
goal.title: Inclusion
goal.description: Team demonstrated respect and embraced their differences.

goalGroup.title: Teamwork
goalGroup.description: - Team clearly showed they had worked as a team throughout their journey

goal.name: teamwork
goal.title: Teamwork
goal.description: Team clearly showed they had worked as a team throughout their journey.

goalGroup.title: Fun
goalGroup.description: - Teams clearly had fun and celebrated what they have achieved.

goal.name: fun
goal.title: Fun
goal.description: Team clearly showed they had worked as a team throughout their journey.

subjectiveCategory.name: project
subjectiveCategory.title: Innovation Project
subjectiveCategory.scoreSheetInstructions: Teams should communicate to the judges their achievement in each of the following criteria. This rubric should be filled out during the Innovation Project presentation. Judges are required to tick one box on each separate line to indicate the level the team has achieved. If the team exceeds, please make a short comment in the Exceeds box.

goalGroup.title: Identify
goalGroup.description: - Team had a clearly defined problem that was well researched.

goal.name: identify_1
goal.title: Identify1
goal.description: Team had a clearly defined problem.

range.shortDescription: Partially clear definition of the problem
range.title: Developing

goal.name: identify_2
goal.title: Identify2
goal.description: Team problem was well researched.

range.shortDescription: Partial research from more than one source
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear, detailed research from a variety of sources
range.title: Accomplished

goalGroup.title: Design
goalGroup.description: - Team generated innovative ideas independently before selecting and planning which one to develop.

goal.name: design_1
goal.title: Design1
goal.description: Team generated innovative ideas independently before selecting which one to develop.

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence of an inclusive selection process
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence of an inclusive selection process
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence of an inclusive selection process
range.title: Accomplished

goal.name: design_2
goal.title: Design2
goal.description: Team showed evidence of planning which idea to develop.

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence of an effective plan
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence of an effective plan
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence of an effective plan
range.title: Accomplished

goalGroup.title: Create
goalGroup.description: - Team developed an original idea or built on an existing one with a prototype model/drawing to represent their solution.

goal.name: create_1
goal.title: Create1
goal.description: Team developed an original idea or built on an existing one .

goal.name: create_2
goal.title: Create2
goal.description: Team developed a prototype model/drawing to represent their solution.

range.shortDescription: Simple model/drawing that helps to share the solution
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Detailed model/drawing that helps to share the solution
range.title: Accomplished

goalGroup.title: Iterate
goalGroup.description: - Team shared their ideas, collected feedback and included improvements in their solution.

goal.name: goal_0
goal.title: Iterate1
goal.description: Team shared their solution/ideas.

range.shortDescription: Shared their solution with user OR professional
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Shared their solution with user AND professional
range.title: Accomplished

goal.name: iterate_2
goal.title: Iterate2
goal.description: Team shared improvements in their solution.

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence of improvements in their solution
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence of improvements in their solution
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence of improvements in their solution
range.title: Accomplished

goalGroup.title: Communicate
goalGroup.description: - Team shared a creative and effective presentation of their current solution and its impact on their users.

goal.name: communicate_1
goal.title: Communicate1
goal.description: Team shared a creative and effective presentation of their current solution.

goal.name: communicate_2
goal.title: Communicate2
goal.description: Team shared their current solution and its impact on their users.

range.shortDescription: Solution and its potential impact on others unclear
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Solution and its potential impact on others partially clear
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Solution and its potential impact on others clear
range.title: Accomplished

subjectiveCategory.name: robot_design
subjectiveCategory.title: Robot Design
subjectiveCategory.scoreSheetInstructions: Teams should communicate to the judges their achievement in each of the following criteria. This rubric should be filled out during the Robot Design explanation. Judges are required to tick one box on each separate line to indicate the level the team has achieved. If the team exceeds, please make a short comment in the Exceeds box.

goalGroup.title: Identify
goalGroup.description: - Team had a clearly defined mission strategy and explored building and coding skills they needed.

goal.name: identify_one
goal.title: Identify1
goal.description: Team had a clear mission strategy for the robot and attachment. Team had a clear mission strategy for the programs written.

goal.name: identify_two
goal.title: Identify2
goal.description: Team members learned about robot building. Team members learned about coding

range.shortDescription: Limited evidence of building and coding skills in all team members
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Inconsistent evidence of building and coding skills in all team members
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Consistent evidence of building and coding skills in all team members
range.title: Accomplished

goalGroup.title: Design
goalGroup.description: - Team produced innovative designs and a clear workplan, seeking guidance as needed

goal.name: design_1
goal.title: Design1
goal.description: Team had a plan for building their robot. Team had a plan for writing their programs

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence of an effective plan
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence of an effective plan
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence of an effective plan
range.title: Accomplished

goal.name: design_2
goal.title: Design2
goal.description: Team explained the innovative features of their robot. Team explained the innovative features of their code

range.shortDescription: Minimal explanation of robot and code's innovative features
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial explanation of robot and code's innovative features
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear explanation of robot and code's innovative features
range.title: Accomplished

goalGroup.title: Create
goalGroup.description: - Team developed an effective robot and code solution matching their mission strategy.

goal.name: create_1
goal.title: Create1
goal.description: Team explained their robot, attachments and sensors. Team explained their programs, and use of sensors

range.shortDescription: Limited explanation of their robot and its attachment and sensor functionality
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Simple explanation of their robot and its attachment and sensor functionality
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Detailed explanation of their robot and its attachment and sensor functionality
range.title: Accomplished

goal.name: create_2
goal.title: Create2
goal.description: Team explained how their robot will complete the missions. Team explained how their code makes their robot act.

range.shortDescription: Unclear explanation of how code makes their robot act
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partially clear explanation of how code makes their robot act
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear explanation of how code makes their robot act
range.title: Accomplished

goalGroup.title: Iterate
goalGroup.description: - Team repeatedly tested their robot and code to identify areas for improvement and incorporated the findings into their current solution.

goal.name: iterate_1
goal.title: Iterate1
goal.description: Team explained how they tested their robot. Team explained how they tested their code

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence of testing their robot and code
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence of testing their robot and code
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence of testing their robot and code
range.title: Accomplished

goal.name: iterate_2
goal.title: Iterate2
goal.description: Team made improvements to their robot. Team made improvements to their code.

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence their robot and code was improved
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence their robot and code was improved
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence their robot and code was improved
range.title: Accomplished

goalGroup.title: Communicate
goalGroup.description: Team's explanation of the robot design process was effective and showed how all team members have been involved.

goal.name: communicate_1
goal.title: Communicate1
goal.description: Team explained their robot design process and their program design process

range.shortDescription: Unclear explanation of robot or code design process
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partially clear explanation of robot or code design process
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear explanation of robot or code design process
range.title: Accomplished

goal.name: communicate_2
goal.title: Communicate2
goal.description: All team members were involved with the robot design and with the program design process.

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence that all team members were involved
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence that all team members were involved
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence that all team members were involved
range.title: Accomplished

nonNumericCategory.title: MN Programming Award
nonNumericCategory.description: The Minnesota Programming Award is presented to the team best demonstrating an in-depth understanding of sound programming principles, as observed during the Robot Design judging.

nonNumericCategory.title: Engineering Excellence
nonNumericCategory.description: This award celebrates a team with an efficiently designed robot, an innovative project solution that effectively addresses the season challenge, and Core Values evident in all they do.

nonNumericCategory.title: Breakthrough Award
nonNumericCategory.description: A team that made significant progress in their confidence and capability and who understand that what they discover is more important than what they win.

nonNumericCategory.title: Rising All-Star
nonNumericCategory.description: A team that the judges notice and expect great things from in the future.

nonNumericCategory.title: Motivate
nonNumericCategory.description: A team that embraces the culture of FIRST LEGO League through team building, team spirit, and displayed enthusiasm.

nonNumericCategory.title: Judges Award
nonNumericCategory.description: This award is given at the Judges discretion to a team that deserves recognition but does not fit it another category.

nonNumericCategory.title: Innovation Project Model
nonNumericCategory.description: Referee Submitted Award for most Creative Innovation Project presented by team
